program_tag.description: Tag used to link events to this program

is_active.description: Whether this program is currently active

offer_type.description: Type of offer for this program: none, BOGO, or bulk discount

bulk_discount_threshold.description: Number of tickets needed to trigger bulk discount

bogo_buy_quantity.description: Buy X quantity for BOGO offer (e.g., 3 in 'buy 3 get 1 free')

bogo_get_free_quantity.description: Get Y free quantity for BOGO offer (e.g., 1 in 'buy 3 get 1 free')

bogo_logic_type.description: BOGO calculation method: 'buy_x_get_y_free' = user enters X, receives X+Y, pays for X (legacy). 'enter_total_pay_less' = user enters total tickets wanted, pays for fewer
